div.div: Αἴγισθος : son of Thyestes, and cousin of Agamemnon. As paramour of Clytaemnestra, he murders Agamemnon, and after ruling seven years over Mycenae, is himself killed by Orestes, Od. 3.196, Od. 4.512 ff., Od. 11.409.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
